alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 29 at 4:02PM CST until December 29 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN SUNFLOWER AND SOUTHEASTERN BOLIVAR COUNTIES... At 401 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Renova, or 9 miles northwest of Cleveland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Renova around 410 PM CST. Shelby and Mound Bayou around 415 PM CST. Drew around 425 PM CST. Parchman around 430 PM CST. Rome around 435 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Winstonville, Beulah, Pace and Merigold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for north central and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
